Projects

Petty

https://github.com/lucasgrocha/petty

A fullstack project made of ReactJS/Typescript and Ruby on Rails as API

This application is an awesome helper for entire pets, using this app you can find out your lost or meet a new loyal friend by adopting one! üê∂
You can search for pets according to Its age or address (both city and state) and add a new one providing Its pictures, name, age, etc.

Pokedex

https://github.com/lucasgrocha/pokedex

A ReactJS/Typescript pokedex that consumes an API to retrieve all data of pokemons.

This app is an awesome Pokedex, you can search for pokemons, you can learn about its details, e.g: attack and defense power, discover its types, its speed and more, as well as see all evolutions from base to last evolution and add to favorites a pokemon that you want to catch to become bigger than Ash Ketchum ü§ü.

Some of main libs

  • react-bootstrap
  • react-js-pagination
  • axios
  • react-router-dom

Experience

Agrosmart

Web Developer - Ruby on Rails

November 2019 - May 2020

I worked on software development using Ruby on Rails, ReactJS, PostgreSQL, among other technologies. I performed bug fixes, implemented new features and developed automated tests using RSpec. The work dynamics, based on methodologies, provided me with experience with Scrum, Kanban and OKR. In addition to the new features and bug fixes, I also developed some projects, for example a security system to avoid multiple requests on the server, which could indicate an eventual attempted invasion. This and other projects were really fun to be doing because I was able to learn several other more technical concepts of web development.
